thread.title: Zelda: Breath of the Wild Release Date Announced
thread.title_full: Zelda: Breath of the Wild Release Date Announced

author: Jonathon Dornbush
title: Zelda: Breath of the Wild Release Date Announced
text:
The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild now has an official release date — and you won't have to wait long to play it. 
Nintendo has revealed that Breath of the Wild will release on March 3, 2017, alongside the Switch. 
Recent reports suggested that Nintendo had reversed course in delaying the game until June , instead deciding to debut the game alongside the launch of the Switch in March. Nintendo had not previously offered an exact release date for Breath of the Wild, and never explicitly said the game would be a launch title for Nintendo Switch — only that it would release sometime in 2017 . 
Continue reading…
